title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Pronunciation-Integrated Vocabulary Microlearning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic vocabulary comprehension and digital device usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can accurately produce target vocabulary (200 words) pronunciation (phonemes/stress/rhythm) within six months
Learners can voluntarily identify and correct over 50% of pronunciation-related episodes (PREs) occurring during class
Participate in pronunciation training modules at least three times weekly in mobile environments to improve fluency in vocabulary use by 30%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
